play.tokens: CMT:COIN TOSS: Alabama wins toss, defers choice to 2nd half. LSU will
play.text: COIN TOSS: Alabama wins toss, defers choice to 2nd half. LSU will

comment.text: receive. Alabama will kick off and defend the north end zone. This
the first toss all season that LSU has not won.
